title: Captain John's Treasure Will Be Important Later
theory: The Captain John treasure map that Luffy gives to Buggy in this episode will become significant later in the story. Some fans theorize that Captain John's treasure might contain important items, historical artifacts, or even lead to revelations about the Rocks Pirates era, given that Captain John was a member of the legendary Rocks Pirates crew.
author: One Piece Fan Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Speculative theory with no concrete spoilers

title: Buggy's Alliance with Luffy Foreshadows Future Cooperation
theory: The unlikely alliance formed between Luffy and Buggy in Impel Down, despite their past as enemies, foreshadows that Buggy will continue to be inadvertently connected to Luffy's journey and may play a role in major future events. Some fans theorize this pattern of forced cooperation will continue throughout the series.
author: One Piece Theory Community

title: Hancock's Love for Luffy Will Have Major Consequences
theory: Hancock's willingness to risk her Warlord position and use her powers to smuggle Luffy into Impel Down demonstrates the depth of her feelings. Fans theorize this will have major consequences for her status with the World Government and may lead to her losing her Warlord position or facing other repercussions.
author: One Piece Community
